name: Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Juggernaut Liebe
text:
3 Level 11 monsters
Once per turn, you can Xyz Summon "Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Juggernaut Liebe" by using 1 Rank 10 Machine Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; this card gains 2000 ATK/DEF, also other monsters you control cannot attack for the rest of this turn. This card can make a number of attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase equal to the number of its materials +1.
